description: Application for a non-material amendment following a grant of planning permission ref: P/2011/2338 dated 11/05/2012 for Redevelopment to provide two mixed-use buildings with roof level amenity space (seven-storeys and eight-storeys) to provide 184 student units on upper floors and 382m2 on ground floor for use as student lounge and lobby, and uses within Retail (Use Class A1), Financial and Professional (Use Class A2), Restaurants and Cafes (Use Class A3), Business (Use Class B1) or Non-residential Institutions (Use Class D1); creation of biodiversity park and community pocket park; provision of four parking spaces and 132 cycle parking spaces: amendments consisting of changes to the internal layout of the building to vary the proposed mix of student accommodation in Block A & B
